name: Effect of Silence
description:
This game was made in 9 days for #Scream Jam.
The plot of the game: You are going to save mom, but you ran out of gas. Someone from the village must have gasoline, right?

I will be glad to comment. And
https://twitter.com/klyps385 - Please subscribe to see the progress of development and maybe we can come up with something great.
